emergency.prompt: Winter is coming. It's time to buy a new coat.

buttons.description: There's limited stock available on a branded trench coat. Go for it!
Buy some pain killers and walk it off.

expenses.prompt: You need new boots to replace your salt-stained ones from last year

buttons.description: I can finally buy the UGGs I've been eyeing all year

expenses.prompt: You made a pact with your friends to go bar hopping this weekend. After all you are still young and its New York

buttons.description: I can't go back on my word!
I was drunk when I made the pact. I'm gonna ditch and chill at home with a glass of wine

bonus.prompt: Your friend invited you for a poker game. The buy in is $50. You can potentially win $200. Would you like to play the game?
